name: Counter Castle [Demo]
description:
This is a DEMO of a combat system that I will likely refine and expand upon for use in a future project. This is unlikely that I will further develop this specific project. Please enjoy. Controls:

- [M] to mute

- Movement: WASD, or arrow keys, space

- Attack: Left mouse, X, or O     - hold down and attack when in the air to slam

- Parry: Right mouse, C or P

If you have any suggestions of games that I could build around this combat, please leave a comment.
